content:
1
ITEM NO.16               COURT NO.12               SECTION II-A
               S U P R E M E  C O U R T  O F  I N D I A
                       RECORD OF PROCEEDINGS
SPECIAL LEAVE PETITION (CRIMINAL) Diary No(s). 30736/2025
[Arising out of impugned final judgment and order dated  02-05-2025
in BA No. 3394/2025 05-05-2025 in BA No. 3627/2025 passed by the 
High Court of Jharkhand at Ranchi]
YOGENDRA PRASAD                                    Petitioner(s)
                                VERSUS
NITESH KUMAR SINGH @ NITU SINGH & ANR.             Respondent(s)
IA No. 151147/2025 - EXEMPTION FROM FILING C/C OF THE IMPUGNED 
JUDGMENT
IA No. 151146/2025 - EXEMPTION FROM FILING O.T.
IA No. 151145/2025 - PERMISSION TO FILE ADDITIONAL 
DOCUMENTS/FACTS/ANNEXURES
IA No. 151142/2025 - PERMISSION TO FILE PETITION (SLP/TP/WP/..)
 
Date : 07-07-2025 This matter was called on for hearing today.
CORAM :  HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE PANKAJ MITHAL
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE K.V. VISWANATHAN
[PARTIAL COURT WORKING DAYS BENCH]
For Petitioner(s)  Mr. K. Shiva, AOR
                   Ms. Aakriti Priya, Adv.
                                      
For Respondent(s)  
          UPON hearing the counsel the Court made the following
                             O R D E R
1.Permission to file the Special Leave Petitions are granted.
2.Learned counsel for the petitioner, after some arguments,
submits that he may be permitted to move to the High Court
concerned  for  recall  of  the  impugned  order(s)  or  for  the
cancellation of the bail order, as the order(s) has been passed on
certain incorrect facts.2
3.In view of above, the petitioner is permitted to move to the
High Court concerned.
4.Accordingly,  the Special Leave Petitions are dismissed.
5.Pending application(s), if any, shall stand disposed of.
(VARSHA MENDIRATTA)                             (NIDHI MATHUR)
COURT MASTER (SH)                             COURT MASTER (NSH)
